en:
慈母亭
(Címǔ tíng)

Mother Pavilion

Translations of 慈母亭
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

慈母
    Mother, Loving mother, A mother, A loving mother, Motherly
亭
    Pavilion, kiosk, booths, kiosks, Ting
ja:
慈母亭
(Címǔ tíng)

母パビリオン
(Haha pabirion)
